trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a collection of selectable child items.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un controllo che funge da contenitore per una raccolta di elementi figlio selezionabili.

trans-unit.source: The children of this element support the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio di questo elemento supportano il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [Mapping dei Pattern di controllo per i client di automazione interfaccia utente](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per esempi di controlli che possono implementare questo pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: I valori delle proprietà memorizzati nella cache devono essere richiesti in precedenza utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>per ottenere il valore corrente di una proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sulle proprietà disponibili e il relativo utilizzo, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Una struttura contenente memorizzato nella cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà richiesta non è presente nella cache.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto corrente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Questo modello deve provenire da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>con un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>riferimento per ottenere i valori correnti.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>ottenuto usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contiene solo dati memorizzati nella cache e il tentativo di ottenere il valore corrente di qualsiasi proprietà genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A>per ottenere il valore memorizzato nella cache di una proprietà che è stato precedentemente specificato utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sulle proprietà disponibili e il relativo utilizzo, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Struttura che contiene l'oggetto corrente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event that is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit"></xref> constant permits.
trans-unit.target: Identifica l'evento viene generato quando una selezione in un contenitore ha subito modifiche significative e richiede l'invio di ulteriori eventi di aggiunta e rimozione di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit"> </xref> consentito dalla costante.

trans-unit.source: An invalidated event is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit> constant permits.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento invalidato quando una selezione in un contenitore ha subito modifiche significative e richiede l'invio di ulteriori eventi di aggiunta e rimozione di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit>consentito dalla costante.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref> pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore del pattern viene passata ai metodi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>per recuperare il pattern di controllo di interesse da specificata <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the selected items in a container.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà che ottiene gli elementi selezionati in un contenitore.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non è presente e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>deve essere recuperata utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
